comment: Cool paper. It shows that the cells can migrate better with the attractin protein but have there any studies to show the effect in vivo? Has this protein been targeted by any medication? I also wonder if Attractin supplementation could help in someone without cancer, could there possibly be any health benefits of increasing cell mobility?

The only effect in vivo that we know is the fact that this protein is upregulated in advanced glioma. However, this protein in normal body has important functions in immune response and control of obesity.
